Field Label: We would like to know about what you do --are you working now, looking for work, retired, keeping house, a student, or what?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, WORKING NOW | 2, ONLY TEMPORARILY LAID OFF, SICK LEAVE OR MATERNITY LEAVE | 3, LOOKING FOR WORK, UNEMPLOYED | 4, RETIRED | 5, DISABLED, PERMANENTLY OR TEMPORARILY | 6, KEEPING HOUSE | 7, STUDENT | 8, OTHER (SPECIFY):
